titles.title: A resolution to order the printing of 300 additional copies of the Senate Document entitled "The Older Americans Act Amendments of 1987: A Summary of Provisions."

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Senate Committee on Rules discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/18/1988--Introduced. Authorizes additional printing of Senate Document 100-68, 100th Congress, 1st Session, entitled "The Older Americans Act Amendments of 1987: A Summary of Provisions" for the use of the Special Committee on Aging.
